name: Sherri Bragg
text: This place was the pits!  Everything was dirty like it hadn't been cleaned in a month of Sundays.  The bed sheets and quilts had cigarette burn holes in them. No extra toilet paper in the bathroom.   The refrigerator was rusty and had what looked like green mold in it.  The place looked like it hadn't been updated in fifty years!  Overpriced as well.  Glad we only stayed one night here.  Yuck!

name: Spice of Life - S.O.L Co.
text: not sure who gave this motel anything over a one star but let start off by saying I work on the road traveling a lot and I have never given a 1 star to any place I've stayed. check my reviews. I'm not sure where to begin so I guess I'll start with trying to get in the room. key didn't work and it's not a card that one can just get reprogrammed it's old school key....sink was broken, guy tried to blame it on me....only was in the room for a minute doing my check in inspection....i could say more but not worth getting worked up about it. Just know there is no refunds of any sort....that should tell you enough right there.

name: Enrique Aguilar
text: Nice admosphere, plenty space for my camper and courteous attendant. Rates are very reasonable too.

name: Rebecca Duke
text: Good place to rest your head for the night.

name: Jana Darlene
text: All the sinks leak. No lamp shades, light bulbs. Noone cleans your room if you stay more than one day

name: mikey Robison (sippi)
text: Ok this motel sucks on housekeeping manager is hardly around and when you rent the sure you use a card and the he gives you a receipt trust me I stay there for 6 months do not use cash

text: the leveled this place down its no longer here

name: Jerry Dozier
text: Bad place to stay

name: Jesse Reece Mitchell
text: Fair

name: Rick Plunkett
text: Great service wifi does have it's issues but hey what motel doesn't? Friendly and personable staff king bed and two bed $55 single bed $45 great deal if you need somewhere to get away

name: Jennifer Gurley
text: The rooms are clean and economical. The staff is personable. It is situated in a decent part of town. The owners are not so nice.

name: Albert Jones
text: Nice clean rooms . Down home southern Folk's. Quiet place to get away just to relax and get naked with the one you love

resp.text: ThanK You for you kind review.

name: Raymond Moore
text: This place is a dump. They charged 145 a night during race week/weekend. Normally it's 45 a night which is still a ripoff. The toilet felt like it was falling over into a hole beside the bathtub. The shower head is only 5 ft high. There were dead bugs on the floor upon arrival. The tv did not work properly, we had to unplug it to turn off. The police were in the parking lot 2 times when I returned after races . I just want others to know what this place is like before booking a room here

name: Samantha Fleming
text: Has improved quite a bit lately! I wouldn't say it doesn't have problems, but it has cleaned up significantly. And, if you do have a problem or request, Harry (manager) will try his best to accommodate

name: Kim Heath
text: Should be NO stars!!   Horrible horrible experience. Ended up not even staying all 3 nights.  Dirty room, torn up, bugs everywhere & the worst part was the manager saying he did not have a reservation for me & he clearly did.  Thank goodness for Travelocity.  Do not stay here.  We won’t be back.

name: Jason Mallet
text:
This place deserves negative stars.

1) They didn't have our reservation information so we got double charged for the room. Refused to refund.

2) BULLET HOLES IN OUR ROOM WINDOW.

3) Room was filthy. Not vacuumed, stains all over bedsheets, cigarette burns all over blanket.

text: rather quiet there. clean. they are courteous and do care about their guests privacy and needs. particular when it comes to animals and IF somebody says you have a pet there..they come check! and yay they dont like Drama either! and no other guests in your room but just the ones on your check in card! had very nice time there! would do it again.

name: Alisha Hawkins
text: America's Best? Maybe if your an out -of-towner here for a few days. We locals that have used they're extended stay service located at the back of the property call it "Americas Worst". Service, care and personability are non existant! Wish there was a negative rating!

name: Raymond “ReD” David Smith
text: Love this hotel when I'm in mobile this is where it's going down.

name: Renee Mrosowski
text: The Party Hotel! I know it says "Adventure Inn" on the sign but this has been known as the Mardi Gras Party Hotel for decades. It's old & dingy and you can't get me drunk enough to go in the pool but the rooms are reasonably clean and it's the best place to stay if you're looking for a cheap rate during Mardi Gras because the staff puts up with the drunken craziness with good grace.

name: Rick Paler
text: Rooms were old and the carpet was stained.  Every morning at 6:00am staff would move carts outside the room and wake me up!

name: Thori Brewer
text: To the best of my knowledge this place is now closed!  Good riddance!  Tried twice to have out of town guest stay here and it was a disaster.  Both time they had to leave before staying the night and the staff did not care!  I have report them closed to Google but they say it can't be confirmed, so it is still listed.

name: Renette Whitehead
text: Stayed a weekend there several years ago but had a good experience. Liked being on the water.

name: debstermax1
text: This restaurant is not worth your time and money.  The prices are outrageous!  Menus are scarce and it is bad when the waitress has to explain that she has to wait for a menu to be available.  We had just moved to the area.  My husband and I tried it on our Anniversary.  We ordered a steak dinner.  The waitress who was the owner sat around with friends chatting at another table while we waited.  When we finally received the meal, the steak was not cooked right and it was not hot, the baked potato would not melt butter.  Flies all over the place.  We asked for a to go box paid our bill,  and went home and finished cooking and eating there.  The owner is a very rude person. She acts like she is drunk and she is not a nice person.  It is not like the website says or the picture, it is nasty, trashy and has a bad reputation in the area for drug deals.  Just ask the local people.  We will never go there again.

name: Casey Wall Orem
text: The lighthouse is a warm and welcoming place. They are renovating still. Since some areas are under light construction they gave us much cheaper rates. Loved our time here

name: Bama Wild
text: Doesn't even deserve a star in my book. Earlier this year my husband and I tried to stay there. dirty, nasty no place to sit your luggage. GROSS FLOORS and showers. the bed had spring sticking out of it. We left in the middle of the night YUCK! is all I have to say. NO REFUNDS and we had paid for 3 days. We didn't care if we lost the money. we just needed to go... Don't eat there either YUCK! DO NOT RECOMMEND! Spaced out crackheads...

name: Danny Schneck
text: When are the crackhead owners of this crap hole going to finally sell this place and let some people who AREN'T felons and drug addicts take over?  This could be a fantastic place if crackheads weren't running it and working there.

name: Suzan Meeks Watson
text: It's a beautiful spot and it's going to be very nice when the renovations are complete!

name: Donnette Reeves
text: Only one waitress.....she seemed nice, but the service and food was terrible. Flies everywhere inside the restaurant! Had to swat to keep them out of our food & sodas. Food definitely wasn't worth the high cost!

name: Darlene Hill
text: A great place  to eat food  very good but just to pricey for today  economy !!

text: Very. Very. Nice. And. Helpful. And. Friendly. The. Breakfast. Was. A. Full. Breakfast. Not. Just. Continental. Style. And. They. Had. Actual. Tables. We. Are. Going. Back. And. Will. B. Staying. There. Again.

text: Excellent

name: Frank Maldonado
text: Food's good....

name: Sean Lyle
text: Mirror  right next to the bed , which is at just the right height.....

name: Floral Designs
text: The towels were clean. The bed linens may have been clean, I'm not sure. They were horribly stained. The carpet was clean. We had reserved a non-smoking room. However I think the rooms below us on the first floor were smoking rooms and we smelled like smoke after our stay. There were cigarette burns all over the furniture in our room. There were holes in the walls. They are the only motel in Piedmont so we didn't have much of a choice. There were people in the parking lot at all times of the night. Next time we will stay in Jacksonville or Gadsden.

name: Kelly Blanks
text: Pros: Good water pressure, plenty of parking, decent price, fairly clean. Cons: Pillows were flat, mystery stains on filthy walls, spider eggs on the ceiling.

name: Scottie Bryant
text: For what some call a 1 star motel, the person up front is kind and willing to help with towels, soap, shampoo and anything you need for your room. The facilities are clean if not in need of some repair like a crack in the shower floor, but nothing bad enough to knock the owners for. One negative is that the rooms have super thin walls so you can hear the TV playing in the room next to you, but other than that, I had a pretty pleasant experience with this motel.

name: Gregory Thompson
text: Good clean place an soon it will be some good food!

name: Kathryn Moore
text: The ladies there are such amazing people.

name: Pamela Greenleaf
text: This fake, ScrewBalla's Motel doesn't exist!!!

name: Art Of Valor
text: Room service is outstanding

name: Wesley Edwards
text: The room was very clean, the hallway smelled like pot but that was due to a few guests down the hall.  The staff was extremely nice and friendly. There was plenty of security to make us feel safe.  Some touch ups here and there are needed but it didn't take away from the quality of room. I would definitely stay again.

name: V N
text: Nice room for the price! The room I chose had no fridge or microwave but that's because I specified that. Check in was fast. Breakfast was ok, but filled my belly. Pool needed cleaning but the manager sent maintenance right away & took care of it. Definitely staying here again!

name: KeMaya Chantal
text: Really nice and cozy and everything including the mini fridge, microwave, and linens were clean. Didn't really expect much for the price but it definitely was worth the stay. I highly recommend this place for anyone not wanting to spend an arm and a leg on a nice hotel stay

name: Jerry Jolly
text: Really affordable, so much so that I was almost scared away from it. Check-in was quick and easy with a courteous staff member who was prepared for our arrival. Place is older but super clean and appeared newly renovated.

name: Shawn Schleppi
text: For the price, it's not bad but just for a night. There was dog hair on one of the beds and the water in the shower didn't drain. Also heard loud partying most of the night so try not to be too close to the pool if possible.

name: Shaunie J
text: If I could give it no stars I would. This place had the nerve to take my money for my reservation and then turn around and let someone extend their stay. I am evacuating my home from hurricane Matthew and have no where else to go. Seriously?!? I'm not okay with this!!

name: Alexis G
text: I wish I could rate 0 stars. Room was disgusting. Used bath rags, rose petals on the floor from previous people, super dusty, and dirt all over floor. No big deal they probably just forgot that room right? NO. The hallway was worse. Looks like it's never been vacuumed. I'm talking piles of dirt. Trash and even used qutips on the floor. How nice. Oh and our room smelled like weed.

name: John Willis
text: A tired old run-down Motel 6. The two positive things here are it's cheap and I saw no bugs if price is your primary criteria then stay here

name: TONY Bl
text: A nice place to stay but there was no microwave or fridge in our room a big downer one star off for it.

name: Jessica Fry
text: Decent place to spend the night, you get what you pay though,  still not bad, would stay again.

name: Nikki Turney
text: Clean room, no frills.  Good enough for an overnight stay passing through.

name: Emilee Springer LaRosa
text: Our room was spacious and very affordable. Not the fanciest, but great value for the price!

name: Nick Turney
text: Booked thru Hotwire, 50 bucks for the night, room waz clean, hotel was quiet. There was an outdoor pool that looked nice, but we didn't use it.  Free breakfast in the morning, but we didn't check that out. Couldn't ask for more.

name: Billy Holdeman-Bass
text: Great rooms, friendly staff. Breakfast wasn't that great, but good nonetheless.

text: They said they had queen beds but they were full beds and b it was noisy during the night but the beds were comfy

name: TOM WORMINGTON
text: Warning for using Hotelwiz & La Quinta! We booked 2 rooms for Jan 30 in Dec with Hotelwiz. When we arrived at motel they said we only had 1 room but they said they would take care of it & went ahead & gave us 2 rooms. Lo & behold when we got our credit card bill they charged us for the 2nd room again. We called the motel & after 2 calls they took the charge off. But when we got our March credit card bill they had charged us again. Called them again, now they say they can't take charge off it is Orbitz's fault. I don't know how the got involved.The run around that's all we got and we still have to pay an extra room charge. Not happy at all!

text: It was clean and very easy to get to. The night desk man was very nice and the morning breakfast was cereal, waffles, juice, biscuits and gravy, fruit and yogurt. Being next to a main highway  I  was surprised the traffic wasn't louder. Stayed on a Monday night though. I'd stay here again

text: The rooms were nice and clean. The breakfast in the morning was way better then I thought it would be. It was overrall a great experience.

name: Carl Dodson
text: We stayed at this hotel on October 18th, 2014 and found it to be less than favorable conditions. The room my son and I stayed in was two full beds. The bathroom had one towel and smelled of urine. My father in law stayed in another room that had NO linens and NO towels. We brought this up to them the next morning and they stated that they only had 2 people to clean 17 rooms and that if they had the cash we would have received a full refund. Because no cash was on hand they said they'd mail us one. Well it came today. Apparently the disgusting rooms we stayed in were only worth a $15 refund on an $76 room. No matter how desperate I am, I would not chose this hotel to stay in again.

name: Jordan Campbell
text: The hotel was only about $65 but I expect nicer for that price. The lobby had peeling  wallpaper and mold on the walls. The hotel room was mostly clean but not in great shape.  It has an old Square television from about 15 years ago. The chain on the hotel door had been ripped off. The breakfast was very minimal with only  8 pieces of bread, 3 muffins, and two Bagels. And a couple types of cereal. The bed was comfortable

name: Aidan Murphy
text: The hotel was very clean and the room was nice. I thought it was very good value for the price and found the management very helpful. WiFi was fast.

name: Jasmine Terry
text: We checked in around 9pm with our 4 kids excited to swim the next morning. I was shocked to find out the pool doesn't open until 11:00 which no surprise is check out time. I couldn't believe that a hotel even a lower end hotel like this one would purposely choose to do that to their guests for no reason. I dealt with the dusty rooms with lack of proper maintenance for the face that the kids could swim. If they are going to run a hotel with stains on the blankets, patchy work in the bathroom and just plain dirt on the walls then the least they could do is offer a pool to their guest that they have to pay to run anyways...

name: Hunter Harrison
text:
Terrible customer service the air condition was broken couldn't tell what the ac was being put on because the nob was broke. The room had a funky smell. The bottle of shampoo was opened and half way used. The bed covers had cigarette burns in them. The bath towels are small like kitchen towels. The pillows were so uncomfortable from being washed and dried the wrong way. The room was hot as hell. The service was absolutely terrible. No breakfast but orange juice. The coffee machine was dirty.
I called about an extra charge on my account that was charged after I left and got home and they told me to come back and we will refund it we have to see it on order to refund. Very hard to understand some of the people there. Called again and talked to a american.
She got an attitude with me was very rude and very disappointed in this hotel and everything that they say they are. They are not partners with best Western. They have the best Western corprate number on the bill they hand you at check out. They are the worst customer care and hotel I have ever been in. Everyone save your money and your experience and don't go to this hotel. The pool is always locked and closed not matter what time it is.I will not be coming back to this poor establishment.

name: minnie killen
text: I went here for my bachlorette party. The woman at the front was very rude to us. We called and made a reservation and it was just 3 of us and she tried to claim she asked how many was staying (she didnt) and after getting an attitude she just passed us threw then we asked for a pillow and they made this huge deal like its a pillow dude. And then we tried to get one towel and they said they wouldnt give us a towel unless we brought them one. The room had smudges everywhere the front door hardly locked the bathroom door looked like it was kicked in.. i mean its a good distance from things in town but the service could of been better.

name: beatm8ker2012
text: Lady at front desk was rude...also didnt give deposit back...when i came vack to fet it she said.."im not looking and im not giving it back so what are you gonna do" i filmed her cuz she was rude a talking crazy!!!!

name: Larkiin Haney
text: Average.  Not many places to stay here. Prefer best hotels

name: Cedric Ambers
text: It's a flee bag motel for crack smokers and hookers. There may be everything known to man running around in this place. I wouldn't let my dog stay there and I surely wouldn't let my family stay there. If you like being in filth then that's the place to go.😷😷😷😷😷😷😷😷😷💀💀💀💀💀💀

name: Randy Neville
text: No thermostat s in rooms controlled from office tropical heat!!!

name: Cryaaron Farris
text: It is clean and has lots of light. Good channel selection. Its older but cozy and has a beautiful view of the lake. The management was very polite and friendly. Also they allow dogs and the price is great.

name: Kat Marie
text: It's very nice.  Price is great.  Loved the view from my room.  Big sliding glass door on the back open ups to a beautiful view of the river.

name: Timothy Smith
text: Go once a year for fishing, they are continually improving rooms. Have fridge microwave and new firm mattress. Nothing fancy but really set up good for boats. They don't call it Big Bull anymore but it will always be that to me. Also have boat launch which is fine if water is up, might be a trick in winter time.

name: Tina Bradford
text: Hot water doesn't  last long!

name: Sis Mckee
text: My aunt enjoyed staying there  thanks to employees she said was really nice to them and helpful.  Thank you guys for all y’all did for my aunt and uncle.

name: Wayne West
text: Super clean and very friendly!  A great little out of the way place! Nice little bar and grill right next door too. Really wish I could have spent a few more days!

name: Tammy Douglas
text: I love this place the owners are very friendly I stopped here every time I'm in town wouldn't go anywhere else

name: Thomas Cummings

text: I mean for the price you can't beat it. Nobody bothers me nice and quiet I rent by the week.

name: Carrie Venable
text: Rooms had holes covered with tape.

name: Marquita Holt
text: Nice people

name: George Moodilye
text: Our room is unclean, comforter has hole in it. Fire hazard in bathroom, the light is uncovered, wires are exposed and close to the shower head. If, you splash when you shower it could cause a fire in the bathroom. I have pictures to show it. Our TV channels 5, 7,10,11,12 15, and 21 does not have sound,, just  picture. No ice bucket, no microwave. No TV guide in brochure rack on desk. Should have a luggage rack to set your suitcase on. Will not stay here again. I did ask the front desk, if they have a rack that your small suitcase will lay on, she said that they didn't have one.

name: De Hilbun
text: Rooms were clean and orderly. Front desk helpful and polite. Rooms did have an odor. Not terrible just odd.

name: Ramon Rey Iv
text: Sherry was extremely helpful and very nice. She helped me and my family out so much! The room was pretty nice too. We will definitely be back!

name: Gay Demmer
text: Liked absolutely nothing about this place. It is run down. Beds were messy - not even sure the sheets had been changed. One light didn't work. Analog tv with no NBC stations. Soap wrapper left on tub. Toilet seat was not secured. No Kleenex and no extra roll of toilet paper. Room was non smoking but still smelled of cigarette smoke. Walls partially patched and not painted. Paint pealing in bathroom.

name: kisha franks
text: HORRIBLE. The room had mildew everywhere in the shower and walls. There was food stains on the wall and food caked in the microwave. The air condition unit had dirt and dust on top to where it was blowing the dirty out when on. The toilet comes up out the ground when you sit on it. IT WAS JUST A HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE. Then when i went to inform the staff Bernadett was nasty and didn't care about the room and wasn't even apologetic about the condition of the room. Got my money back quick and fast. This place need new management or needs to be torn down and rebuilded. I wish I could give it -1000000.

name: Brian Arthur
text: Disgusting. Got to our room did my little room sweep and there were pieces of food underneath the bed sheets and the bed sheets them selves had some stains or dirt on them and dirty towels and wash clothes on the floor of the bathroom. On top of that the desk clerk was very un helpful and totallu screwed up the refund process. Absolute travesty.

name: T Lev
text: I'm staying here for two days on business and I've never experienced a hotel this bad before. House keeping doesn't do anything, there was no toilet paper in my bathroom the night I arrived, the lights barely work and they are dim when they are on. Just now I called the service desk from my cellphone because the room phone doesn't work and I needed a toilet plunger for the toilet. The receptionist caught an attitude when I asked her if she had a plunger. I'm only here because my job paid for my stay, I'll be telling my company to never book here again for any other field agents. Worst hotel experience I've ever had. Do yourselves a favor, trust the stars and reviews, they really mean something.

name: Kelsey Nicholas
text: Great hotel. Staff was amazing, loved staying here.

name: Kelsey Nicholas
text: Great hotel. Staff was amazing, loved staying here.

name: Jesse Elkins
text: Piss poor management I was working nights and when asked about room service I was told they don't cater to day sleepers so it was be woke up in the middle of the day to have my room serviced or no room service after this visit if I ever come back I'll find an extended stay even if I have to drive a little further or I'll pay more for a better hotel

name: Alyssa Davis
text: The pictures that are posted are NOT what the rooms look like at all. The sheets were obviously not changed when we arrived and the new ones they gave me have holes in them. The furniture is really banged up and the carpet is pretty nasty. There isn't a fire alarm or good light in the bathroom... and there is about 2 inches of space between the floor and the outside door. I would NOT stay here again!

name: Cody Parker
text: Very nice and clean. Modren update. I askedfor a extra fridge because we had grocries and they delivered the next day. Great place for the price

name: L WH
text: My family and I were traveling from Texas to Virginia and booked 2 rooms on Friday July 25, 2015. I have stayed in many hotels and motels for work as well as when traveling and this was THE worst overnight accommodations I have ever stayed in. One room smelled so strongly of mold that is was almost unbearable. The carpet was so gross I wouldn't let anyone take their shoes or socks off! The other room had black mold and a ceiling that was falling in. The rooms were not inexpensive so it was the worst money I ever spent! Never will stay at a Choice Hotel again!

name: Shantel M
text: Wishing I could give this place 0 stars. I will upload photos to yelp. Absolutely disgusting with black mold in the shower, lights out and cigarette burns on the sheets.

name: Gordon Burnett
text: Bed bugs and one of the worst rooms I've ever seen.  Asked for a refund and was told they couldn't give a refund. I was in the room 3 min at the most. It smelt like mold, pulled the sheets back and watched two bugs walk away.  I wouldn't recommend to anyone to stay at this dump.  It doesn't deserve one star at al

name: Felix Diaz
text: Is good for The Price but sometimes no work Good the microwave or the refrigerator

name: carla abney
text: Thanks to mlucio we were able to get some much needed sleep. She was sooooo friendly and professional.  Thx again mlucio

name: David Todd Hunter
text: Overpriced, not clean, horrible service

name: Jennifer Williams
text:
I visited your location on Friday July 10, 2015. Along with my husband, brother, sister in law and their son.
We check in about 1 am.
We are not from the area we had to come in on an emergency trip. My mother had a major heart attached. ( She was there helping her mother after her mother had heart surgery 2 weeks ago.)
So by the time we traveled as we did and spent all of the time at the hospital with my mother we wanted to sleep.
We arrived at your location checked in and went to the room. When I first walked in I notice that the ashtray was filled with cigarette butts, walked to the bathroom and seen that there was urine on the floor by the commode, then I got to looking and notice that the shower was very nasty the ceiling looked as it was fixing to fall, the shower rod was barley hanging on, and a piece of duct tape just stuck to the wall. Also notice that there was hair on the towel. Very unhappy at this point I thought let me look at the bed, the first bed was dirty, it had hair and spots all over the sheets the 2nd bed it had food on the sheets and brown spots.
At this point I had enough was so upset. I had dropped my keys behind the chest and had to move it and surprise again a powder substance with a straw.
I am NO longer upset I am MAD.
I went down to the lobby and told the desk clerk what I was dealing with. She let me know she did not have any more rooms I ask for more sheets and towels, just so that I could lay down for a few hours to be back at hospital with my mom. She said hold on walked around the corner and walked back said she did not have any and there was "NOTHING SHE COULD DO FOR ME". Really!!!!!!!
So because we had all of our items unpacked already I decided that I would just run to the nearest Walmart purchase sheets and blankets. Just so that we can get some sleep.
We did not even take showers due to not having clean towels.
So I was putting the sheets and things on the bed and SURPRISE AGAIN the matters had a very big whole in it and then I was beside my self.

name: C. Suarez
text: The staff is always very attentive.

name: Steve Nix
text: If I could have given this a lower rating and still posted I would have. Hands down tje dirtiest, nastiest place I have ever stayed in. We had to evacuate because of hurricane Matthew and this was the closest place we could find after 10 hours on the road. They raised the price to 125$ a night and never made anything better. Called us today that they are only refunding half after being told that we would receive a full refund. Sleep in your vehicle before staying here because that's what I will do if it ever came down to it again.

name: Jarvis Giles
text: Great rooms better price

name: Blake Gillis
text: Right off the interstate i10 for saraland. My room was on the bottom floor. Rooms are outside the building. Are not pet friendly

name: Terrelle Tillman
text: Disgusting hotel.. dirty bedding, uncovered lighting in bathroom, pet hair in the carpet, burn holes in covers, as well as dirty covers. Old dusty furniture.

name: Matt Martinez
text: we paid then went to the room and immediately walked out it was disgusting stained chair smelled of smoke really bad broken dresser the bed was sunk in in the middle went down.and requested another room bit it was the same story I think this place is a drug hotel there was trash everywhere in and around the parking lot and trashcan overflowing on to the walkway we got a refund and left to a nicer hotel December 2015

name: Bryan Thornton
text: Friendly staff really nice

text: The room smell  and the AC had mildew in it . I left out didn't go any farther. I ask for a refund.

text: Tv didn't work. No fan in bathroom. Light in bathroom takes over a minute to come on. Toilet ran all night. Least the heater worked.

name: jesse larson
text: Horrible housekeepers if you can even call them that. They steal from you and do a crappy job cleaning your room. Also they have a Roach problem the only somewhat good thing is the bar connected to the building, but its not worth it STAY SOMEWHERE ELSE you'll be much better off

name: R M
text:
My dad and I went out and did an archery hunt with Wayne and his team. We immediately felt like part of the family and really enjoyed the hunting. We will definitely return for another hunt.

-Richard

name: Cool Change Outdoors
text: We hunted this place last year and had a decent trip but didn’t see any deer that qualified for their size rules so we decided to give it another try this year on a better week during the rut. This year the place was full with 14 hunters and we were rotated through The same unproductive stands over and over throughout our four-day trip seeing the same small deer. When we asked the guide in the mornings what the plan was for the day they told us they had no idea which let us to believe there was very little scouting or planning for our group. Day three with heavy rains expected we were put in open tree stands with no cover and when we called to be picked up they were unresponsive and we had to walk a mile and a half out on our own. They had us hunting out of on maintained box blinds and ripped and torn ground blinds that looked like they were 10 years old. Last year we had home cooked meals for lunch and dinner this year we got fast food Popeyes chicken sandwiches and order our pizza. Not the type of service you’d expect for $1800 per person. Do yourself a favor stay clear of this place

name: Gary Jones
text: Tks for the honest review Cool Change. I crossed this place off my list.

name: Sam Decker
text: Do not take your kids to this lodge. They are not safe there.

name: Deanmu6uio Paulin
text:
This is the first time I have used a professional hunting service.
The lodge was really nice. The food was great. The Curtis family and my guide Jeff really took care of me.
Saw at least 52 turkeys and lots of deer. I passed on shooting an 8 pt.
Going back in January.
I can't wait. I highly recommend the place.

name: Mel Shrader
text: Great visit in January. Saw plenty of game and the outfitter was great. Lodge was top notch and the limited number of hunters made for a great hunt.

name: Sean Word
text:
Absolutely a GREAT TIME!!! Will and his family offer a great place with wonderful hospitality..Mrs Curtis cooks the BEST meals!!! Will has a great hunting area ..very well managed and BEAUTIFUL land..LOTS OF DEER!!! Thanks for a wonderful time

Sean Word
Griffin GA

name: Pam Kirkland
text: Great people, beautiful place!!

name: Leon McClellan
text: Great place!  Absolutely love the Curtis family!

name: george Horshok
text: I had a very positive experience.  Will Curtis went out of his way to accomidate a last minute hunt for me.  I saw around 90 deer in 2 1/2 days.  Approximately 30 bucks.  The other guys in camp had similar numbers of deer seen.  This is a trophy hunt.  I wanted to kill a big buck, so i passed on a lot of deer.  This was a mid december hunt.  So, the really big bucks were moving at dark.  I didnt kill a deer, but that was my decision.  I will go back

name: Shay Carnley
text: Amazing place!!!

name: Damon Blythe
text: Great family run operation!

name: Brian Ames
text: Lodging and food are good, the hunting was horrible.
